Hero.headline: Slow WordPress website due to <blue>heavy images?</blue>
Hero.subheadline: SmallPict automatically reduces image sizes so your WordPress website faster than before without any complicated settings.

Features.title: Key Features
Features.subtitle: Everything you need for a super fast WordPress website
Features.f1_desc: Install, activate, and done. No confusing server configuration or complicated API keys.
Features.f2_desc: Smart AI technology ensures the smallest possible file size without sacrificing visual quality.
Features.f3_desc: Compression happens in our cloud, so your hosting server stays light and fast. Works with all hosting types.

Pricing.title: Pricing
Pricing.heading: Transparent & Reasonable Pricing
Pricing.subheading: Choose the plan that fits your needs. No hidden fees.

HowItWorks.title: How It Works
HowItWorks.subtitle: Three easy steps to a lighter WordPress website.
HowItWorks.step1_desc: Download and install the SmallPict plugin on your WordPress dashboard.
HowItWorks.step2_desc: Upload images as usual. SmallPict works in the background compressing images.
HowItWorks.step3_desc: Enjoy instant loading speeds and better SEO scores.

Testimonials.title: Testimonials
Testimonials.heading: Trusted by Content Creators
Testimonials.t1: Our WordPress website is 2x faster in 5 minutes — without any settings. Truly the solution we've been looking for.
Testimonials.t2: SmallPict helps my travel blog load super fast despite many high-res photos. Google PageSpeed went up drastically!
Testimonials.t3: Best solution for our agency. Managing hundreds of client sites is much more efficient without worrying about servers.

Footer.brandMessage: SmallPict — lightweight solution for WordPress websites that want to stay fast without compromising quality.
